ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound horseradish root - peeled, ends trimmed, cut into 1/4-inch dice
¾ cup water, or as needed - divided

cookingTips: Work with horseradish in a well-ventilated area as the fumes are very potent
Process horseradish with water to prevent darkening and maintain color
Use immediately or refrigerate; flavor intensifies over time
